DescriptionData.Title: Pride Socks - MixMatched Rainbow Striped Athletic Socks
DescriptionData.Description: Rainbow tube socks are fun costume or athletic socks. The 19" tube socks are sized for kids and adults. The rainbow striped tube socks will run knee high for kids and ½ to ¾ knee high for adults. The white tube socks are high quality and durable and have different stripes of rainbow color at the top each sock. One sock has stripes of red, orange, yellow and the other has stripes of green, blue and purple. 75% Ring Spun Cotton, 14% Nylon, 7% Acrylic, 4% Spandex. Made in the USA.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: One sock has stripes of red, orange, yellow and the other has stripes of green, blue and purple
75% Ring Spun Cotton, 14% Nylon, 7% Acrylic, 4% Spandex Made in the USA
